1. ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®æ•´å½¢

1-1. ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®ç¢ºèªãƒ»ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒªã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆ
Ræ¨™æº–ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆchickwtsã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦æ£’ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆchickwtsã¯ã€ä¸ãˆãŸé¤Œã”ã¨ã®é¶ã®ä½“é‡ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã§ã€ä¸€åˆ—ç›®weightã«é¶ã®ä½“é‡ã€äºŒåˆ—ç›®feedã«é¤Œã®ç¨®é¡ãŒè¨˜è¼‰ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

# ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã®ä¸­èº«ã®ç¢ºèª

  weight      feed
1    179 horsebean

3    136 horsebean
4    227 horsebean

ã¾ãšggplot2ã‚’ä½¿ã†ãŸã‚ã«å¿…è¦ãªtidyverseãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
exactRankTestsãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯å¾Œã§æ¤œå®šã‚’è¡Œã†ã¨ãã«ä½¿ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ï¼ˆæ¤œå®šã‚’è¡Œã‚ãªã„å ´åˆã¯ä¸è¦ï¼‰
ggsignifãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯æœ‰æ„å·®ã‚’ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•å†…ã«æ›¸ãè¾¼ã‚€ã¨ãã«ç”¨ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ï¼ˆã“ã‚Œã‚‚åŒæ§˜ã«ã€æœ‰æ„å·®ã‚’æ›¸ãè¾¼ã¾ãªã„å ´åˆã¯ä¸è¦ï¼‰

library(tidyverse) # ggplot2ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã®ã«å¿…è¦
library(exactRankTests)ã€€# æ¤œå®šã‚’è¡Œã†éš›ã«ä½¿ç”¨ï¼ˆå®Ÿæ–½ã—ãªã„å ´åˆã¯ä¸è¦ï¼‰
library(ggsignif) # æœ‰æ„å·®ã‚’ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•å†…ã«æ›¸ãè¾¼ã‚€éš›ã«ä½¿ç”¨



1-2. æ¨™æº–åå·®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®è¿½åŠ 
ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã¯æ¸¬å®šå€¤ã—ã‹å«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚
æ£’ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã¯å¹³å‡å€¤ã¨æ¨™æº–åå·®ã®å€¤ã‚’ç”¨ã„ã¦ä½œæˆã—ãŸã„ã®ã§ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’æ•´å½¢ã—ã€å¹³å‡å€¤ã¨æ¨™æº–åå·®ã‚’ã¾ã¨ã‚ãŸæ–°ã—ã„ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆchickwts_sum_dataã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
ãã®ãŸã‚ã«ã€ä¸ãˆãŸé¤Œfeedã”ã¨ã«ã‚°ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ—åŒ–ã—ã¦ã€å¹³å‡feed_meanã¨æ¨™æº–åå·®sdã‚’æ±‚ã‚ã¾ã™ã€‚

chickwts_sum_data <- chickwts %>%
  group_by(feed) %>%
  summarize(weight_mean=mean(weight), sd=sd(weight))

# ä½œæˆã—ãŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã®ä¸­èº«ã‚’ç¢ºèª
head(chickwts_sum_data)

# A tibble: 6 Ã— 3
  feed      weight_mean    sd
  <fct>           <dbl> <dbl>
1 casein           324.  64.4
2 horsebean        160.  38.6

5 soybean          246.  54.1
6 sunflower        329.  48.8


ã“ã‚Œã§ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã®æº–å‚™ã¯æ•´ã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚
æ¬¡ã¯ã€ä½œæˆã—ãŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆchickwts_sum_dataã‚’ç”¨ã„ã¦ggplot2ã§æ£’ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã‚’ä½œã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚




2. æ£’ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã®ä½œæˆ
ggplot2ã§ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã€bar_plotã¨ã„ã†å¤‰æ•°ã«æ›¸ãè¾¼ã‚“ã§ã„ãã¾ã™ã€‚
ã¾ãšã€ggplot(ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿, aes(x=xè»¸ã«ä½¿ã†ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿, y=yè»¸ã«ä½¿ã†ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿))ã‚’æ›¸ãè¾¼ã¿ã¾ã™ã€‚
æ¬¡ã«ggplot2ã®æ£’ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ä½œæˆé–¢æ•°ã§ã‚ã‚‹geom_bar()ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦æ£’ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚geom_bar()å†…ã§æŒ‡å®šã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹statã¯ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®æ‰±ã„æ–¹ã§ã™ã€‚ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã ã¨è¦ç´ æ•°ã‚’ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã—ã¦ã—ã¾ã†ã®ã§ã€ä»Šå›ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«æ£’ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã®é«˜ã•ãŒãã®ã¾ã¾å…¥ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’æ‰±ã†éš›ã¯identityã‚’æŒ‡å®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

bar_plot <- ggplot(chickwts_sum_data, aes(x=feed, y=weight_mean)) +
  geom_bar(stat='identity')

print(bar_plot)











3. è£…é£¾

3-1. ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’ä»˜ã‘ã‚‹
geom_errorbarã§ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’ä»˜ã‘ã¾ã™ã€‚yminã¨ymaxã¯ãã‚Œãã‚Œå¹³å‡ã‹ã‚‰æ¨™æº–åå·®ã‚’å¼•ã„ãŸå€¤ã¨è¶³ã—ãŸå€¤ã‚’ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ã§ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã®ç¯„å›²ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

bar_plot <- bar_plot +
  geom_errorbar(
    aes(ymin = weight_mean - sd, ymax = weight_mean + sd),
    width = 0.15, # ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼å…ˆç«¯ã®å¹…
    linewidth = 0.4 # ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã®å¤ªã•
    )

print(bar_plot)










3-2. è»¸åã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹

bar_plot <- bar_plot +
  labs(
    title = 'é£¼æ–™ç¨®åˆ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ¯ãƒˆãƒªä½“é‡',  # ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«
    x = 'ãƒ‹ãƒ¯ãƒˆãƒªé£¼æ–™',               # xè»¸ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«
    y = 'å¹³å‡ä½“é‡',                   # yè»¸ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«
  )

print(bar_plot)










3-3. æ¤œå®šã§æœ‰æ„å·®ã‚’ç¤ºã™
caseinã¨ãã®ä»–ã®é£¼æ–™ã§æ¤œå®šã‚’è¡Œã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
æ¤œå®šã«ã‚‚æ§˜ã€…ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ãŒã€ä»Šå›ã¯ã‚¦ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚³ã‚¯ã‚½ãƒ³ã®é †ä½å’Œæ¤œå®šã€æœ‰æ„æ°´æº–0.05ã§æ¤œå®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚


horsebeanlinseedmeatmealsoybeansunflower



test_casein_horsebean <- wilcox.exact(
  x = filter(chickwts, feed=='casein')[,1], 
  y = filter(chickwts, feed=='horsebean')[,1], 
  paired = FALSE)
print(test_casein_horsebean)


    Exact Wilcoxon rank sum test

data:  filter(chickwts, feed == "casein")[, 1] and filter(chickwts, feed == "horsebean")[, 1]
W = 117, p-value = 2.165e-05
alternative hypothesis: true mu is not equal to 0





test_casein_linseed <- wilcox.exact(
  x = filter(chickwts, feed=='casein')[,1], 
  y = filter(chickwts, feed=='linseed')[,1], 
  paired = FALSE)
print(test_casein_linseed)


    Exact Wilcoxon rank sum test

data:  filter(chickwts, feed == "casein")[, 1] and filter(chickwts, feed == "linseed")[, 1]
W = 128.5, p-value = 0.0005325
alternative hypothesis: true mu is not equal to 0





test_casein_meatmeal <- wilcox.exact(
  x = filter(chickwts, feed=='casein')[,1], 
  y = filter(chickwts, feed=='meatmeal')[,1], 
  paired = FALSE)
print(test_casein_meatmeal)


    Exact Wilcoxon rank sum test

data:  filter(chickwts, feed == "casein")[, 1] and filter(chickwts, feed == "meatmeal")[, 1]
W = 94, p-value = 0.09084
alternative hypothesis: true mu is not equal to 0





test_casein_soybean <- wilcox.exact(
  x = filter(chickwts, feed=='casein')[,1], 
  y = filter(chickwts, feed=='soybean')[,1], 
  paired = FALSE)
print(test_casein_soybean)


    Exact Wilcoxon rank sum test

data:  filter(chickwts, feed == "casein")[, 1] and filter(chickwts, feed == "soybean")[, 1]
W = 138, p-value = 0.004283
alternative hypothesis: true mu is not equal to 0





test_casein_sunflower <- wilcox.exact(
  x = filter(chickwts, feed=='casein')[,1], 
  y = filter(chickwts, feed=='sunflower')[,1], 
  paired = FALSE)
print(test_casein_sunflower)


    Exact Wilcoxon rank sum test

data:  filter(chickwts, feed == "casein")[, 1] and filter(chickwts, feed == "sunflower")[, 1]
W = 72.5, p-value = 0.9893
alternative hypothesis: true mu is not equal to 0





æ¤œå®šã®çµæœã€p-valueãŒæœ‰æ„æ°´æº–0.05ä»¥ä¸‹ãªã®ã¯horsebeanã€linseedã€soybeanã®3ã¤ã§ã—ãŸã€‚
ã—ãŸãŒã£ã¦ã€caseinã‹ã‚‰ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ï¼“ã¤ã®ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã«ç·šã‚’å¼•ã„ã¦ã€æœ‰æ„å·®ã‚’ç¤ºã—ã¦ã„ãã¾ã™ã€‚

bar_plot <- bar_plot +
  geom_signif(
    comparisons = list(c('casein','horsebean')),
    y_position = 400, 
    annotation = '***',
    vjust = 0.7,
    tip_length = 0.05
  ) +
  geom_signif(
    comparisons = list(c('casein','linseed')),
    y_position = 440, 
    annotation = '***',
    vjust = 0.7,
    tip_length = 0.05
  ) +
  geom_signif(
    comparisons = list(c('casein','soybean')),
    y_position = 480, 
    annotation = '**',
    vjust = 0.7,
    tip_length = 0.05
  )
print(bar_plot)










3-3. èƒŒæ™¯ãƒ»è»¸ãƒ»ç›®ç››ã‚Šã‚’ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ã™ã‚‹

bar_plot <- bar_plot +
  theme(
    ## ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã®è¨­å®š
    plot.title = element_text(size = 13, color="black", hjust = 0.5),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 10, color="black", angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 12, color="black", hjust = 0.5),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10, color="black", hjust = 0.5),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    ## æ ãƒ»ç›®ç››ã‚Šã®è¨­å®š
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
    panel.border = element_rect(color='black', fill='transparent', linewidth=0.8),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white",color = NA),
    aspect.ratio = 1,
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits=c(0,530), expand=c(0,0))
print(bar_plot)








ã“ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ä½œæˆã—ãŸãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆbar_plotã¯ã€ggsaveã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã§ç”»åƒãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¨ã—ã¦ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚
ggsave(
  plot = bar_plot,
  file = './bar_plot.png',
  dpi = 300,
  width = 3.5,
  height = 3.5
)

ä»Šå›ã¯ã€ã“ã®æ£’ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¦ã„ãã¾ã™ã€‚










ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã§ç”¨æ„ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒ
ggplot2ã§ã¯æ—¢ã«theme_gray(), theme_bw(), theme_linedraw(), theme_light(), theme_dark(), theme_minimal, theme_classic(), theme_void(), theme_test()ã®ï¼™ã¤ã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒãŒç”¨æ„ã•ã‚Œã¦ãŠã‚Šã€ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã§ã¯`theme_bw()ãŒé©ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã®è‡ªä½œ
è‡ªä½œã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã‚’ä½œã‚‹ã«ã¯ã€é©å½“ãªå¤‰æ•°ã«æŒ‡å®šã—ãŸã„ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã®è¦ç´ ã‚’æ›¸ãè¾¼ã‚€ã ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚å…·ä½“çš„ã«ã¯ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€theme()ã‚’æ›¸ãè¾¼ã¿ã¾ã™ã€‚ä½œæˆã—ãŸãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã¯ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã¨åŒã˜ã‚ˆã†ã«ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚
ã‚ã‚‹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã«åˆ¥ã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã‚’é‡ã­ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚
theme_costom <- theme(
  # ã“ã“ã«æŒ‡å®šã—ã„è¦ç´ ã‚’æ›¸ãè¾¼ã‚“ã§ã„ãã¾ã™ã€‚
  # axis.line = ...
)

# ã„ã¤ã‚‚é€šã‚ŠæŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§é©ç”¨ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚
plot <- plot + theme_costom # ã“ã‚Œã§plotã«ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒãŒé©ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã€‚

ãã¾ã‚Š
è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ãã‚Œãã‚Œã®è¦ç´ ã«ã¯ã€element_blank()ã‹element_text()ã‹ã€element_line()ã‹ã€element_rect()ã®ã„ãšã‚Œã‹ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ãã®è¦ç´ ã‚’ãªãã—ãŸã„å ´åˆï¼ˆä½•ã‚‚è¡¨ç¤ºã—ãŸããªã„å ´åˆï¼‰ã¯element_blank()ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚









å‰Šé™¤
element_blank()




ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆ
element_text()
ãƒ»familyãƒ»faceãƒ»colourãƒ»sizeãƒ»lineheightãƒ»hjustãƒ»vjustãƒ»angleãƒ»marginãƒ»debug
ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆæ›¸ä½“ï¼ˆplain, italic, bold, bold.italicï¼‰æ–‡å­—è‰²æ–‡å­—ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºè¡Œã®é«˜ã•æ°´å¹³æ–¹å‘ã®ä½ç½®ï¼ˆ0: å·¦æƒãˆ, 0.5: ä¸­å¤®æƒãˆ, 1: å³æƒãˆï¼‰å‚ç›´æ–¹å‘ã®ä½ç½®ï¼ˆ0: ä¸‹æƒãˆ, 0.5: ä¸­å¤®æƒãˆ, 1: ä¸Šæƒãˆï¼‰æ–‡å­—è§’åº¦ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ³ãƒ‡ãƒãƒƒã‚°


ç·š
element_line()
ãƒ»colorãƒ»linewidthãƒ»linetypeãƒ»lineend
ç·šã®è‰²ç·šã®å¹…ç·šã®ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«ï¼ˆ0ã‹ã‚‰6ã§æŒ‡å®šï¼‰ç·šæœ«ç«¯ã®ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«ï¼ˆround, butt, squareï¼‰


å››è§’å½¢

å¡—ã‚Šã¤ã¶ã—è‰²æ ç·šã®è‰²æ ç·šã®å¹…æ ç·šã®ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«





æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹è¦ç´ 
éå¸¸ã«é•·ããªã‚Šè¦‹ã¥ã‚‰ã„ã§ã™ãŒã€themeã®ä¸­ã«ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªè¦ç´ ã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚
theme(
  title,                  # ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«
  aspect.ratio,           # ç¸¦æ¨ªæ¯”ï¼ˆ1:æ­£æ–¹å½¢, 0.5:æ¨ª:ç¸¦=2:1ã®é•·æ–¹å½¢ï¼‰
  axis.title,             # è»¸ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«

library(tidyverse)

plot <- ggplot(Indometh, aes(x=time, y=conc, )) +
    geom_line(aes(color=Subject), linewidth=1) +
    geom_point(aes(color=Subject),size=1.5) +
    theme_bw() +
    theme(legend.position = "none")
print(plot)

setwd('~/code/graph/temperature')
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(scales)

data <- read.csv('./data/temp_1901to2025.csv', header=F) %>%
  rename('date'='V1', 'temp'='V2') %>%
  mutate(ymd = as.Date(date, format='%Y/%m/%d'), year=as.numeric(format(ymd, '%Y')), day=format(ymd, '%m%d')) %>%
  mutate(period = case_when(
    year >= 1901 & year <=1910 ~ as.factor('1901-1910'),
    year >= 1911 & year <=1920 ~ as.factor('1911-1920'),
    year >= 1921 & year <=1930 ~ as.factor('1921-1930'),
    year >= 1931 & year <=1940 ~ as.factor('1931-1940'),
    year >= 1941 & year <=1950 ~ as.factor('1941-1950'),
    year >= 1951 & year <=1960 ~ as.factor('1951-1960'),
    year >= 1961 & year <=1970 ~ as.factor('1961-1970'),
    year >= 1971 & year <=1980 ~ as.factor('1971-1980'),
    year >= 1981 & year <=1990 ~ as.factor('1981-1990'),
    year >= 1991 & year <=2000 ~ as.factor('1991-2000'),
    year >= 2001 & year <=2010 ~ as.factor('2001-2010'),
    year >= 2011 & year <=2020 ~ as.factor('2011-2020'),
    year >= 2021 & year <=2030 ~ as.factor('2021-2025')
    )
  )
sumdata <- data %>%
  select(temp,day,period) %>% 
  group_by(period,day) %>%
  summarize(meantemp=mean(temp)) %>%
  mutate(day=as.Date(day, format='%m%d'))

temp_plot <-
  ggplot(sumdata, aes(x=day, y=meantemp, group=period, color=period)) +
  geom_line(aes(x=day, y=meantemp, group=period, color=period))

## è£…é£¾
library(RColorBrewer)
#library(extrafont)
#font_import()
#loadfonts()
hight <- -1.3
annotatesize = 4.5
temp_plot <- temp_plot +
  scale_color_viridis_d(option='H') +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-01-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="1æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-02-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="2æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-03-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="3æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-04-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="4æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-05-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="5æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-06-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="6æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-07-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="7æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-08-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="8æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-09-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="9æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-10-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="10æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-11-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="11æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  annotate("text", x=as.Date("2025-12-15"), y=hight, , hjust=.5, label="12æœˆ", family='Noto Sans JP', size=annotatesize) +
  scale_x_date(date_breaks = '1 month',
               #date_labels = "%b",
               expand=c(0.01,0),
               ) +
  labs(
    title = '10å¹´ã”ã¨ã®æ—¥åˆ¥å¹³å‡æ°—æ¸©',
    subtitle = '1901å¹´ã‹ã‚‰2025å¹´ã¾ã§ã®æ—¥åˆ¥å¹³å‡æ°—æ¸©ã‚’10å¹´ã”ã¨ã«ã¾ã¨ã‚ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚',
    y = expression(paste("æ°—æ¸© (",degree*C,")"))
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits=c(-2, 31), expand=c(0,0), breaks=c(seq(0,35,5))) +

  theme(
    ## ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã®è¨­å®š
    plot.title = element_text(family = "sans", size = 15, color="black", hjust = 0),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(family = "sans", size = 10, color="black", hjust = 0),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_text(family = "sans", size = 13, color="black", hjust = 0.5),
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.y = element_text(family = "sans", size = 12, color="black", hjust = 0.5),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
    ## æ ãƒ»ç›®ç››ã‚Šã®è¨­å®š
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "gray90"),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white",color = NA),
    aspect.ratio=.6
  )

ggsave(file = sprintf("./png/temp.png"), plot=temp_plot, dpi = 600, width = 8, height = 5)


setwd('~/code/graph/temperature')
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(scales)

data <- read.csv('./data/temp_1901to2025.csv', header=F) %>%
  rename('date'='V1', 'temp'='V2') %>%
  mutate(ymd = as.Date(date, format='%Y/%m/%d'), year=as.numeric(format(ymd, '%Y')))

sumdata <- data %>%
  select(temp,year) %>% 
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarize(meantemp=mean(temp, na.rm = TRUE))
sumdata <- filter(sumdata,year!='2025')
temp_barplot <-
  ggplot(sumdata, aes(x=year, y=meantemp)) +
  geom_line(color='grey45') +
  geom_point(shape=21, color='gray45', fill='white') +
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", se=FALSE, color='black', linewidth=.5, span = .4)


## è£…é£¾
temp_barplot <- temp_barplot +
  labs(
    title = 'æ±äº¬ã®å¹³å‡æ°—æ¸©æ¨ç§»',
    subtitle = '1901å¹´ã‹ã‚‰2025å¹´ã¾ã§ã®æ±äº¬ã®å¹´å¹³å‡æ°—æ¸©ã®æ¨ç§»',
    y = expression(paste("æ°—æ¸© (",degree*C,")"))
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits=c(1900,2025), expand=c(0.02,0.02), breaks=c(seq(1900,2050,10)))+
  scale_y_continuous(limits=c(12.8, 18.2), expand=c(0,0), breaks=c(seq(0,20,1))) +
  
  theme(
    ## ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã®è¨­å®š
    plot.title = element_text(family = 'Ubuntu Mono', size = 15, color="black", hjust = 0),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(family = "Noto sans JP", size = 10, color="black", hjust = 0),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_text(family = "Noto sans JP", size = 12, color="black", hjust = 0.5),
    axis.text.x = element_text(family = "Noto sans JP", size = 10, color="black", angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    axis.text.y = element_text(family = "Noto sans JP", size = 10, color="black", hjust = 0.5),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
    ## æ ãƒ»ç›®ç››ã‚Šã®è¨­å®š
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "gray90", linewidth = 0.3),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white",color = NA),
    aspect.ratio=.5
  )

#temp_barplot
ggsave(file = sprintf("./png/temp_barplot_jp.png"), plot=temp_barplot, dpi = 600, width = 7, height = 5)
#library(png)
#img <- readPNG('./png/temp_barplot.png')
#grid::grid.raster(img)

temp_barplot_en <- temp_barplot +
  labs(
    title = 'Annual average temperature trends in Tokyo',
    subtitle = 'Changes in Tokyo\'s average annual temperature from 1901 to 2025',
    y = expression(paste("Temperature (",degree*C,")"))
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits=c(1900,2025), expand=c(0.02,0.02), breaks=c(seq(1900,2050,10)))+
  scale_y_continuous(limits=c(12.8, 18.2), expand=c(0,0), breaks=c(seq(0,20,1))) +
  
  theme(
    ## ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã®è¨­å®š
    plot.title = element_text(family = 'Ubuntu Mono', size = 15, color="black", hjust = 0),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(family = "Ubuntu Mono", size = 10, color="black", hjust = 0),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_text(family = "Ubuntu Mono", size = 12, color="black", hjust = 0.5),
    axis.text.x = element_text(family = "Ubuntu Mono", size = 10, color="black", angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    axis.text.y = element_text(family = "Ubuntu Mono", size = 10, color="black", hjust = 0.5),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
    ## æ ãƒ»ç›®ç››ã‚Šã®è¨­å®š
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "gray90", linewidth = 0.3),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white",color = NA),
    aspect.ratio=.5
  )
ggsave(file = sprintf("./png/temp_barplot_en.png"), plot=temp_barplot_en, dpi = 600, width = 7, height = 5)
